name: Message Duplicate Checking
description: Duplicate checking is executed on payments that are either: 1. Received by GPP from external networks (ACH) or internal applications 2. Manually entered or handled by a user Based on the selected algorithm (key message fields such as message type, currency, amount and beneficiary), GPP examines every payment for possible duplication. If a payment is a duplicate, GPP routes the payment to the Dupex queue for manual handling.
